shot.description: Noir night city of tall perfectly gridded towers rising around a calm canal countless window cells glow like stars under a dense starfield.
shot.camera_motion: single slow dolly-in from low angle over the canal surface toward the central tower no pans/zooms/orbits
shot.shot_size: wide establishing to slightly tighter wide
shot.focus_style: deep focus hyperfocal set so buildings remain sharp while water surface holds fine ripples

subject.name: grid-tower skyline
subject.look: rectilinear monoliths with dense square window lattice minimal antennas harsh verticals no signage
subject.behavior: building lights twinkle subtly at random like distant stars

scene.environment: symmetrical business district at night canal or flooded plaza in foreground with mirrored reflections low mounds of dark vegetation along banks
scene.weather: clear sky with many stars dry air faint haze at base of towers
scene.grade: strict black-and-white silver gelatin look with high contrast and soft halation on bright windows

beats.beat: Hold the grand centered one-point perspective starry sky static gentle ripple rings travel across the canal reflection.
Begin slow forward dolly parallax increases on banks a few window cells flicker softly no shimmering artifacts.
Ease closer to the central tower reflections deepen twinkle rate slows settle into a composed wide with verticals perfectly upright.
